name: HungryHoya
0:
”Alexa, Ask hungry hoya for the breakfast menu.”
”Alexa, Ask hungry hoya for the Five Spice menu.”
”Alexa, Ask hungry hoya for the full menu.”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: hungry hoya
des: This skill allows you to ask Alexa what Leo's is serving everyday. You can ask for any of the upstairs restaurant menus or the downstairs Leo's buffet. This skill will also tell you if Leo's is not serving food on weekends or holidays. This skill is based upon the hoyaeats.com website information and calendar.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
